resume_text:
NAME: Henry Lee
EMAIL: henry.lee@email.com
PHONE: (555) 123-7890

SUMMARY:
Cloud Architect with 8 years of experience designing and implementing cloud-based solutions. Expertise in AWS, Azure, and GCP cloud platforms.

SKILLS:
AWS, Azure, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CloudFormation, Python

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Architects Inc. - Cloud Architect (2018 - Present)
- Designed and implemented cloud-based solutions on AWS, Azure, and GCP.
- Automated infrastructure provisioning using Terraform and CloudFormation.

Systems Integrators Ltd. - Systems Engineer (2016 - 2018)
- Managed and maintained on-premises infrastructure.

EDUCATION:
University of Texas at Austin - Bachelor's in Electrical Engineering (2016)

CERTIFICATIONS:
Google Cloud Professional
